title: vArik-koDai vazhangum
sahitya:
vArik-koDai vazhangum Arumukhan pEraruLai kOrip-peravE vArum sIruDaiya cendUril


anupallavi

  ArupaDai vIDu tigazha aDiyAr magizha kAruNyattOd-avarai kaDait-tETriDuvOn


caraNam    pArinil tam vAzhvu pAzhum UzhvinaiyAl sIrazhindiDAdirunda shirandiDavE bhaktar
kOrum varam perak-kUDi kumbiDum bOdhavarkku Ariru karattAlum aLavillAp-parivODu
